newsitem.title: RUSSIA: RIA says Yeltsin surgery completed successfully.
newsitem.headline: RIA says Yeltsin surgery completed successfully.

text.p: RIA news agency, quoting informed sources in the government, said on Tuesday that the operation on President Boris Yeltsin's heart had been successfully completed.

RIA, which has close ties to the presidential administration, said Prime Minister Viktor Chernomyrdin and presidential chief-of-staff Anatoly Chubais had already left the Cardiology Research Centre where the operation took place.
The Kremlin could not initially be reached to comment on the RIA report.

Yeltsin, who had two heart attacks last year, has said he agreed to have the operation to enable him to live a normal life. He said in a statement issued before the surgery began that he was confident that it would go well.
